message.body: Hi Hunter. Are you still looking for land in Western North Carolina?
Not actively. I'm not sure what I'm doing. I'm trying to get a teaching job here for now, but I've been applying for positions in the southeast too. I am ready to leave but it's complicated.
I think it will be amazing when you get here. I have been pretty actively looking for land if you want me to send you info.
I understand how things can be complicated. Good luck finding a job.
Yeah send me some links to land . Did I send you links to the place I looked at in bernsville? He took down the listing but I don't know if he sold it or not
I think so. Burnsville is pretty far from Asheville but is a beautiful area and there are some cool farmers out there. I've been looking in Marshall, wea
I've been talking to a buyer's agent and not sure what's possible but I am pretty serious about making something happen.
